item.title: 04 Jun 2018 03:14
item.description: Looks like we had a heavy pollen shower on Saturday. #Kayaking in Cochituate and Walden Pond with the Bhaskars. Totally mesmerized by the water in Walden pond! Reminded me of kayaking in the springs of Florida. One phenomenal weekend! ðŸ”— )
item.content:encoded: Looks like we had a heavy pollen shower on Saturday. #Kayaking in Cochituate and Walden Pond with the Bhaskars. Totally mesmerized by the water in Walden pond! Reminded me of kayaking in the springs of Florida. One phenomenal weekend! ðŸ”— )
